Policies.Description: Custom policy for KMS administrative actions
Policy allowing only KMS encrypt and decrypt operations
Read-only access to KMS keys and metadata
Access restricted to corporate IP ranges
Access to Secrets Manager with KMS decryption
Access to data lake S3 buckets with encryption
Allows assuming roles in trusted accounts
Explicitly denies KMS key deletion actions
KMS access for CloudFormation stack operations
KMS access based on resource tags
KMS access via multiple AWS services
